abstract.p: Chamique Holdsclaw, Washington Mystics' All-Star guard, helps Women's Sports Foundation introduce Web site designed to encourage girls to participate in sports when she visits Long Island-based orgn's annual conference in Uniondale (S)

block.p: Chamique Holdsclaw, the Washington Mystics' all-star guard, helped the Women's Sports Foundation introduce a Web site designed to encourage girls to participate in sports when she visited the Long Island-based organization's annual conference in Uniondale yesterday.

Gatorade is providing the resources to build the Web site, which Donna Lopiano, executive director of the foundation, said was scheduled to be launched in July. It will have an interactive database of more than 100 sports and fitness activities for girls.

Chamique Holdsclaw, the Washington Mystics' all-star guard, helped the Women's Sports Foundation introduce a Web site designed to encourage girls to participate in sports when she visited the Long Island-based organization's annual conference in Uniondale yesterday.

Gatorade is providing the resources to build the Web site, which Donna Lopiano, executive director of the foundation, said was scheduled to be launched in July. It will have an interactive database of more than 100 sports and fitness activities for girls.
Holdsclaw said she was anxious to return to training camp even though the two stress fractures in her foot prevented her from working out with the team, which opened training camp on Wednesday.
It's coming along, she said. I've been able to run, but I won't be able to have full contact until next Monday.
